info.name: nasa-api
info.description:
# Endpoints Disponibles

## api/nasa/instruments

Método: GET

Lista los instrumentos usados para la medición.

## api/nasa/activities

Método: GET

Lista IDs de actividades encontradas.

## api/nasa/instruments/usage

Método: GET

Muestra el porcentaje de uso de todos los instrumentos

## api/nasa/instruments/usage

Método: GET

Ejemplo de Body:

{

"instrument": "SOHO: LASCO/2"

}

Muestra el porcentaje de uso de un instrumento.

request.description:
This is a GET request and it is used to "get" data from an endpoint. There is no request body for a GET request, but you can use query parameters to help specify the resource you want data on (e.g., in this request, we have `id=1`).

A successful GET response will have a `200 OK` status, and should include some kind of response body - for example, HTML web content or JSON data.
